descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Scourge Resurrection[/color] Eng/Rus

[color=#ffff00]Authors[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, location
9RedMen - navmeshes

[color=#ffff00]Requirements[/color]: Skyrim

This mod adds a Scourge mace from TES3: Morrowind. This weapon can be obtained in the Black Oath Sanctuary southwest from Falkreath. It causes extra damage to daedra and atronachs and also banishes summoned creatures. Can be improved with an ebony ingot.

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY 1 ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***

[color=#ffff00]
